title: Episode 197: Fellowship in Failure with Dr. Akua Boateng
itunes:title: Episode 197: Fellowship in Failure with Dr. Akua Boateng
itunes:subtitle: Kate incorporates some positive self-talk into her day-to-day and Doree begins collecting digital library cards. Then, Dr. Akua K. Boateng, a licensed psychotherapist, discusses how to identify when to set boundaries, what it’s like to be broken up wit...
description:
Kate incorporates some positive self-talk into her day-to-day and Doree begins collecting digital library cards. Then, Dr. Akua K. Boateng, a licensed psychotherapist, discusses how to identify when to set boundaries, what it’s like to be broken up with as a therapist, and how to get started in therapy.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
